Class Parser

java.lang.Object
Parser.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
Recursive descent parser corresponding to yalcc language The parser reads the output of the scanner in test/LexicalAnalyzerOutput.txt, and finds the corresponding left most derivation, outputing the rule number on stdout It also builds a ParseTree, representing the program according to the grammar.

    Parser()
    Creates a new Parser and loads LexicalUnits and tokens from the scanner output file

      Creates a new Parser and loads LexicalUnits and tokens from the scanner output file
      Throws:
      Exception - if the lexical units file cannot be read or parsed

      Throws:
      ParseException - if error occurs during parsing

    • parseCode

      public ParseTree parseCode() throws ParseException
      Productions 2 and 3 : Parses the non terminal <Code> which can be : - <Instruction> ; <Code> - epsilon
      Returns:
      The ParseTree node for <Code>
      Throws:
      ParseException - if any component fails to parse

    • buildTree

      public void buildTree(String filepath) throws FileNotFoundException
      Writes the LaTeX code to a tex file, that can be compiled to make a pdf of the derivation tree
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path to the tex file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file doesn't exist
